thread.section_title: WebsiteBox.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WebsiteBox.com | websitebox.com
thread.title: Belinda

author: Belinda
title: Belinda
text:
I really like WebsiteBox.com. It's relatively inexpensive and with the FREE IDX integration, it can't be beat. The site templates are professional and user-friendly.
I like their chat customer service when you really need them while you're right on the site. However, having been with WebsiteBox.com for over two years, I've only had to use customer service only twice.
